mapper.select: select notiNum,notiTitle,notiContent,notiCreated from notice where notiNum=#{notiNum}
select rownum, data.* from ( select notiNum,notiTitle from notice where (notiNum > #{notiNum}) order by notiNum asc) data where rownum=1
select rownum, data.* from ( select notiNum,notiTitle from notice where (notiNum < #{notiNum}) order by notiNum desc) data where rownum=1
